title: PCL启动器的世界存档在哪里呀？
author: 呼乎水卉
txt_content:
求大佬告诉我一下，没怎么用过PCL






P8E4AWL_TD}MHH5KYL[7PFG.gif
(537.79 KB, 下载次数: 1)

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
有版本隔离就是 ./minecraft/versions/包名/saves
没有的话就是 ./minecraft/saves

replies.author: もぺもぺ
replies.txt_content:
应该是 .minecraft\saves
或者 .minecraft\versions\版本号\saves

replies.author: 呼乎水卉
replies.txt_content: 尽量有图文解释（毕竟我怕我的猪脑子转不过来）麻烦各位大佬了
